name: Contour Software
description:
- Develop car workshop management application to streamline operations for auto repair businesses. 
- Enhanced application architecture using Protocol Oriented Programming, MVVM, and VIPER. 
- Integrated Google ML Kit for advanced License Plate Detection and Barcode Scanning functionalities. 
- Utilized Azure Blob Storage for efficient media management and implemented video compression algorithms. 
- Enhance the app's UI/UX with responsive design tailored for both iPhone and iPad.

name: Avanza Solutions
description:
- Develop and manage mobile banking applications, ensuring compliance with Apple's guidelines. 
-Created a feature-rich Apple Watch app using SwiftUI, expanding the app ecosystem. 
-Integrated mobile payment platforms including Avanza Premier Pay and Apple Pay In-App Provisioning, achieving FIME certification. 
-Implemented robust encryption and security features, enhancing application safety. 
- Provided Arabic language support for international mobile banking users. 
-Mentored junior developers, enhancing their technical skills and professional growth.

name: Truly Future (Pvt) Ltd
description:
- Oversaw the full application lifecycle including planning, design, testing, release, and support. 
- Designed intuitive application flows and user interfaces using Adobe XD and Adobe Photoshop. 
- Developed fully functional iOS and Android applications, leveraging MapBox, Google Maps, Firebase, and Stripe for navigation and payment solutions
